snippet.title: CrossFire HD Story Mode (PVE) - Operation Frost Trailer (China)
snippet.description:
CrossFire HD is developed by Smilegate Entertainment with additional development work done by Remedy Entertainment. The Story Mode (PVE) for CrossFire HD “Operation Frost”, consisting of three episodes, has been developed by Remedy Entertainment. CrossFire HD is being developed for the CrossFire audience in China and is being published by Tencent.

The CrossFire HD trailer promotes the multiplayer modes and the Story Mode (PVE) - Operation Frost, in the upcoming closed beta of CrossFire HD in China.
